Package Controller

Class CustomersModify

java.lang.Object
Controller.CustomersModify
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomersModify extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the CustomersModify screen. This class contains methods to initialize the country and division combo boxes with data from their respective DAO classes. It also contains methods to modify an existing customer when the user clicks the Save button and to return to the Customers screen when the user clicks the Cancel button.
Author:
Mehdi Rahimi

  • Method Details

    • onActionCancel

      void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This function is called when the user clicks the "Cancel" button. It switches to the main menu scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be found.

    • onActionSave

      void onActionSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      This function is called when the user clicks the "Save" button. It checks if the customer information fields are empty, if they are, it will display an error message. If they are not empty, it will modify the customer in the database. It will then switch to the Customers screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be found.
      SQLException - If the SQL query cannot be executed.

    • onActionCountryCombo

      void onActionCountryCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      This method is called when the user selects a country from the country combo box. It will populate the division combo box with the divisions from the selected country.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the SQL query cannot be executed.

    • passedinSelectedCustomer

      public static void passedinSelectedCustomer(Customer customer)
      This function sets the selected customer to the customer passed in from the Customers table view. This is called from the Customers screen. It is called when the user clicks the Modify button.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object that was selected in the previous activity.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is called when the user clicks the Modify button in the Customers screen. It will populate the country and division combo boxes with data from the database. It will also populate the text fields with the customer information from the selected customer.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
